Summary: walking on the street looking at the stars an i saw a bright light flash on top of me super fast then it disapeared
trends: There have been no other sightings in Saint-Lambert
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsi was walking on the street looking at the stars an i saw a bright light behind flashing an it flew right on top of me the flash like a fire ball or a tear kind of shaped on top of me went super fast then it disapeared with a trail an then the trail an the object was gone after a few sec even a man in a taxi stoped cause he saw the same thing an we looked at each other an he went on an i went home it happend so fast it happened between 11 an 12 pm even a bit later an where a i there are lots of planes so im sure that one past by an saw it an i went out a couple of min later maybe 10 or so i saw strange lights floting in the sky like stars but flashing or pulsating, ps if you ever seen something like that plz contact me id like to know more thx alote
Object Shape: Bullet, Missile, Fireball, Flash, Star-like, Teardrop
